plot: Pascal-sensei is an elementary school teacher who is so stupid, he cannot even write his own name. He does whatever he likes in his classroom. Plus, by all appearances, he is not human. (from manga)
opening_theme: "100% Pascal-sensei" (100%パスカル先生) by Hana Satō
ending_theme: "Pascal Rap Rap Ran Ran Ran" by Hana Satō ft. Raja-sensei
